item.title: At the zebra crossing on Southend Rd jct Park Rd and Foxgrove Rd, the new zebra crossing has still not been properly marked in white mastic paint, 8th October
item.description:
At the zebra crossing on Southend Rd jct Park Rd and Foxgrove Rd, the new zebra crossing has still not been properly marked in white mastic paint. The original substandard thin 'house paint' is half gone at this busy A road location. Seen 7/10/25
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Witnessed today Tuesday 7/10/25 between about 3.10 and 3.25pm illegal Worsley Bridge School patent driving onto the footway grass verge in Worsley Bridge Rd near the jct with Brackley Rd and parking on the zig-zag markings, 8th October
item.description:
Witnessed today Tuesday 7/10/25 between about 3.10 and 3.25pm illegal Worsley Bridge School patent driving onto the footway grass verge in Worsley Bridge Rd near the jct with Brackley Rd and parking on the zig-zag markings thus endangering other primary school children at the end of the school day using the zebra crossing and damaging the grass verge. Please install wooden bollards to stop recurrence and provide wardens and patent advice via the Head Teacher.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Worsley Bridge Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently planted oak whip with tree stakes appears to have died (prematurely all brown leaves) fronting 28, Brackley Rd near the jct with Copers Cope Rd., 8th October
item.description:
Recently planted oak whip with tree stakes appears to have died (prematurely all brown leaves) fronting 28, Brackley Rd near the jct with Copers Cope Rd. This whip may be the replacement for the large mature street tree felled 3m away about a year ago. The label says 'please water me' but passing or neighbouring members of the public cannot be relied on to give the necessary regular watering in hot weather.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brackley Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
